1.0.name: wordpress/starpress
1.0.description:
Starpass is a micropaiement solution for bloggers and webmasters to monetize their content on a pay-per-view basis. Customer wanting access a protected document has to call an overtaxed phone number and is given 1 or more code(s) he enters on a form for the system to check. If validation is successfull, customer is redirected to the success url (the product he is paying for), if not to the failure one.

With Starpress plugin, do forget how hard it could be to insert php or javascript code into your posts : just insert shortcodes and get your Starpass micropaiment form working
